title.rendered: New IE Engine for SH2IPDRIVE project

content.rendered:
The machine building company (Ten Heggeler BV, https://ten-heggeler.nl/) has completed the production of components for the IE Engine developed for the SH2IPDRIVE (Sustainable Hydrogen Integrated Propulsion Drives) project.

The engine and test facility for its research are currently being built at the High Pressure Laboratory (HPL) of the University of Twente.

excerpt.rendered: The machine building company has completed the production of components for the IE Engine developed for the SH2IPDRIVE project
